summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 8566, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixth Avenue South, from the north line of Lane Street to the south margin of Vermont Street, and on Dearborn Street, from Sixth Avenue South to Maynard Avenue, by constructing a temporary sewer and sewer outfall, under Resolution No. 195; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899."
